statements: DELETE FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND release_date < '2000-01-01';
DELETE FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Queen' AND duration > 300;
DELETE FROM songs WHERE album_id IN (SELECT album_id FROM albums WHERE title LIKE 'Greatest Hits%');
DELETE FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Artist Name';
DELETE FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
DELETE FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1001 AND created_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 100 AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_playlist WHERE user_id = 50 AND playlist_id NOT IN (SELECT playlist_id FROM playlists);
DELETE FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND release_year < 2000;
DELETE FROM users WHERE registration_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR;
DELETE FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id IN (SELECT playlist_id FROM songs_in_playlists WHERE added_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
